description.value: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

The tabaxi makes two attacks with its claws, its shortsword, or its shortbow.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Feline Agility. When the tabaxi moves on its turn in combat, it can double its speed until the end of the turn. Once it uses this ability, the tabaxi canâ€™t use it again until it moves 0 feet on one of its turns.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
